Item.Value: [Name][Text:So, welcome to the $WorldObject_40$. This is, the heart of any growing city, we wouldn't be anywhere without it.]

[Name][Text:We've got a stonecutting table and a saw mill. All you need to do is keep the materials coming and I'll turn them into the construction materials we need to build the Villager. I can make 30 of each a day, so keep that chest as stocked as you can.]
